page.title: 07THE CHURCH-WARDEN-CHESTERTON
page.content: There are two church wardens who work for Chesterton church only.One has been church warden for about 25 years. The other has recently taken on the job.They are unpaid and their duties include mowing the grass in the churchyard,dealing with maintinance in the church and when a new vicar is to be chosen the church warden helps to decide on the most suitable person.The longer serving church warden finds it quite hard work.He made a candle holder for the Easter candle from a local elm tree in the shape of the ancient font.He also helps the vicar look after the people.
